message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe you'll find it valuable, and I'm willing to make a one-time offer of $1200000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you is $1000000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $1000000. I hope we can reach an agreement that respects both our positions.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1000000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you see in the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am still unable to exceed my budget limit. However, I would like to propose a price of $1050000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while staying within my financial constraints.

I understand that you're still trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I believe the product's value to you is higher than that. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I need a bit more. I'm counteroffering $1075000. I'm confident this is a fair price considering the value you see in the product.
